Classes in system used by actions
GameStatus

Classes in system used by system
Bomb
          The Bomb class represents the Bomb object in the game and detonates after a specific period of time in the game.
Destructible
          This is the Destructible interface class that has the method die.
Difficulty
          This enum documents the difficulty settings in Bomberman.
Enemy
          The Enemy class represents the enemies in the Bomberman Game.
Explosion
          The class Explosion represents the event that occurs when the Bomb dies.
GamePhysics.CollisionType
          This enum represents the various types of collisions in the game
GameStatus
          The GameStatus class contains all the information about the game at any given time.
Ghost
          The class Ghost represents the ghost enemy in the Bomberman Game.
HardBlock
          The class HardBlock/code> represents the Hard Block object in bomberman.
LivingUnit
          The class LivingUnit represents all living units in the bomberman game (enemy, player) it extends class MapObject and implements the interface Moveable.
MapObject
          The class MapObject represents all objects on the map.
Moveable
          This interface Moveable contains the methods needed to move an object in the Bomberman game.
NonLivingUnit
          The class NonLivingUnit represents the location of a non-living object in the Bomberman game.
Player
          The class Player and represents all the characteristics of the player.
Powerup
          The class Powerup represents the types of powerups available in the game.
SoftBlock
          The class SoftBlock reprents the soft block object in the bomberman game.
